kolambaa jathika kauthukagaraye siduwu kauthuka wasthu sorakamata sambandha wi aththe an kisiwaku nowa lansage priyantha mendis nohoth ‘kangatta’ namaththama bawata ee sambandhayen kriyathmaka wimarshanawalin thahawuru karagena atha.rajaya saha polis departhamenthuwa apahasuthawata pathkirime aramunin me pilibanda athamun wiwidha pracharayan gena giyada ee sandaha kisindu amathiwarayaku, wyaparakayaku, polis niladhariyaku, wideshikayaku ho prabhuwarayaku sambandha nomathi bawada eya me pudgalaya kala sorakamak bawata widyathmaka wimarshanawalin pahadiliwama sanatha wi thibena bawada jyeshta niyojya polispathi anura senanayaka mahatha awadharanaya karayi.me sandaha kisindu pitasthara pudgalayeku sambandha nomathi bawa penwadena ee mahatha sorakama siduwu sthanayen labaganna lada angili salakunuwalin ee bawa sanatha karagannata wimarshana kandayam samath wi thibena bawada sandahan karayi.
